short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A convenient Chrome Extension for parsing and calculating your GPA and other information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A extension that can parse your complete academic history in HTML format and make it downloadable in JSON format.
Parsed data is processed and displayed as average mark/GPA, and average mark/GPA for each department (CSC, STA, ECO, etc.).
In addition, this extension will support GPA trend plotting for overall GPA, department GPA.
